alert.note: Alert for Clatsop; Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 06 at 6:24AM PST until December 06 at 1:53PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Nehalem River near Foss. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 15.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low lying farm land and structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM PST Wednesday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 AM PST Wednesday was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 7.0 feet Friday, December 15. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 100 PM PST.
